greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = smallest positive integer k such that both A083221(k, n) and A083221(k+1, n) have at most two prime factors (are primes or semiprimes).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..509
program: (Scheme) (define (A251718 n) (let loop ((i 1)) (if (and (<= (A001222 (A083221bi i n)) 2) (<= (A001222 (A083221bi (+ i 1) n)) 2)) i (loop (+ i 1))))) ;; Code for A083221bi given in A083221.
xref: A005382 gives the positions of 1 after the initial a(1)=1.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 15 2014
